remarks: The Hilbert lattice satisfies the exchange axiom.  Proposition 1(iii) of [Kalmbach] p. 140 and its converse.  Originally proved by Garrett Birkhoff in 1933.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
chpssat.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
chpssat.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
cvexchi $p |- ( ( A i^i B ) <oH B <-> A <oH ( A vH B ) ) $.
